summary: Create a beautiful, functional website to promote the user's YouTube channel (@rashmijoshi6703) and help it grow, including clickable hyperlinks.

existing_features.title: Create a responsive, single-page promotional website for the YouTube channel handle @rashmijoshi6703, with clear calls-to-action and prominent clickable hyperlinks to the channel.

Add content sections suitable for a YouTube channel promo site: Hero (channel name/handle + subscribe CTA), About, Featured content (a grid of video/playlist link cards), and Contact/Links section (additional hyperlinks the owner can add).
Implement a coherent, creative visual theme and apply it consistently across typography, spacing, components, and backgrounds (avoid default/plain styling).
Add basic on-page SEO and shareability enhancements: meaningful page title, meta description, and an attractive hero headline/subheadline (English).
Add a site header with navigation links (in-page anchors) and a sticky or easily accessible “Subscribe” CTA that links to https://www.youtube.com/@rashmijoshi6703.
Add generated static image assets (hero/banner and a channel avatar placeholder) and render them in the UI from frontend/public/assets/generated (do not serve images from the backend).
Add a new content list for the channel’s “Top 5 Most-Viewed Shorts” (five items) in the frontend content data file so the site owner can easily update titles and links without editing UI components.
Add a new on-page section titled “Top 5 Most-Viewed Shorts” that renders the five Shorts as prominent, clickable cards/links consistent with the site’s existing visual style.
Update the site header navigation to include a “Shorts” in-page link that scrolls smoothly to the new “Top 5 Most-Viewed Shorts” section.
